org.dockbox.selene.core.objects.inventory

Interface Inventory

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    InventoryRow
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlayerInventory, SpongeInventoryRow, SpongePlayerInventory

    public interface Inventory
    Represents an inventory UI

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int capacity()
      Returns the total capacity of the inventory.
      default boolean contains(Item item)
      Returns true if the inventory contains the given Item, otherwise false.
      default int count(Item item)
      Returns the total amount of occurrences of the Item as the total quantity.
      default java.util.Collection<Item> findMatching(java.util.function.Predicate<Item> filter)
      Returns all items which match a given filter.
      java.util.Collection<Item> getAllItems()
      Returns all items, including MinecraftItems.getAir().
      Item getSlot(int index)
      Gets the Item in the requested position within the inventory.
      Item getSlot(int row, int column)
      Gets the Item in the requested position within the inventory.
      Item getSlot(Slot slot)
      Gets the Item in the requested slot type within the inventory.
      boolean give(Item item)
      Attempts to give the Item to the inventory.
      default int indexOf(Item item)
      Returns the first occurring index of the given Item.
      void setSlot(Item item, int index)
      Sets the item at the given position within the inventory to the given Item.
      void setSlot(Item item, int row, int column)
      Sets the item at the given position within the inventory to the given Item.
      void setSlot(Item item, Slot slot)
      Sets the item at the given slot type to the given Item.

    • Method Detail

      • getSlot

        Item getSlot(int row,
             int column)
        Gets the Item in the requested position within the inventory. If the position is out of bounds, or if there is no item present, MinecraftItems.getAir() is returned instead. Indices start at zero.
        Parameters:
        row - The row index
        column - The column index
        Returns:
        The Item, or air.

      • getSlot

        Item getSlot(Slot slot)
        Gets the Item in the requested slot type within the inventory. If the slot type is not supported by the inventory, or if there is no item present, MinecraftItems.getAir() is returned instead.
        Parameters:
        slot - The slot type
        Returns:
        The Item, or air.

      • setSlot

        void setSlot(Item item,
             int row,
             int column)
        Sets the item at the given position within the inventory to the given Item. If the position is out of bounds, nothing happens. Indices start at zero.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to place
        row - The row index
        column - The column index

      • setSlot

        void setSlot(Item item,
             int index)
        Sets the item at the given position within the inventory to the given Item. If the position is out of bounds, nothing happens. Indices start at zero.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to place
        index - The inventory index

      • setSlot

        void setSlot(Item item,
             Slot slot)
        Sets the item at the given slot type to the given Item. If the slot type is not supported by the inventory, nothing happens. Indices start at zero.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to place
        slot - The slot type

      • contains

        default boolean contains(Item item)
        Returns true if the inventory contains the given Item, otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        item - The item
        Returns:
        true if the inventory contains the item, otherwise false

      • count

        default int count(Item item)
        Returns the total amount of occurrences of the Item as the total quantity.

        E.g. if two stacks (64) of minecraft:stone are inside the inventory, 128 will be returned.

        Parameters:
        item - The item
        Returns:
        The total quantity of the item

      • getAllItems

        java.util.Collection<Item> getAllItems()
        Returns all items, including MinecraftItems.getAir().
        Returns:
        All items inside the inventory.

      • findMatching

        default java.util.Collection<Item> findMatching(java.util.function.Predicate<Item> filter)
        Returns all items which match a given filter. If no items are present, or none match the filter, an empty list is returned.
        Parameters:
        filter - The filter
        Returns:
        All items which match the given filter.

      • give

        boolean give(Item item)
        Attempts to give the Item to the inventory. If the item cannot be added, false is returned.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to add
        Returns:
        true if the item was added, otherwise false

      • indexOf

        default int indexOf(Item item)
        Returns the first occurring index of the given Item. If the item is not present, -1 is returned.
        Parameters:
        item - The item
        Returns:
        The first index of the item, or -1

      • capacity

        int capacity()
        Returns the total capacity of the inventory. This is equal to the maximum index, plus one (to correct for starting at 0).
        Returns:
        The capacity

      • getSlot

        Item getSlot(int index)
        Gets the Item in the requested position within the inventory. If the position is out of bounds, or if there is no item present, MinecraftItems.getAir() is returned instead. Indices start at zero.
        Parameters:
        index - The inventory index
        Returns:
        The Item, or air.
